TrbNetEntity.name: InputMonitorTrb3sc
TrbNetEntity.description: Input monitoring and trigger signal generation - version for TRB3sc

register.name: MonitorRate
register.description: Sets the rate at which values are written to the fifo.

register.name: MonitorStatus
register.description: Status information of the monitoring block

field.name: MonitorFifoLevel
field.description: Number of data words in fifo for first input

field.name: MonitorWordCount
field.description: Word counter of Fifo control logic

register.name: MonitorTrigger
register.description: Control signals for fifo and counters

field.name: MonitorSingleFifo
field.description: Shows if the design contains a single monitoring fifo only and not one for each input

field.name: MonitorFifoSelect
field.description: Select the input signal to the Fifo, if the single-fifo version is implemented

group.name: MonitorFifos
group.description: Fifos for each input. 1024 words each.

fifo.name: MonitorFifo
fifo.description: Fifo with history of input edge counters. Number of available fifos depends on MonitorSingleFifo and MonitorInputNumber

group.name: MonitorCounters
group.description: Current counter value for each input

register.name: MonitorCounter
register.description: Current value of the input edge counter

group.name: Trigger
group.description: Registers of the trigger generation logic

register.name: TriggerEnable1
register.description: Enables individual inputs 0 - 31 for trigger generation. If enabled, the input adds to the common or

register.name: TriggerEnable2
register.description: Enables individual inputs 63 - 32 for trigger generation. If enabled, the input adds to the common or

register.name: TriggerEnable3
register.description: Enables individual inputs 95 - 64 for trigger generation. If enabled, the input adds to the common or

register.name: TriggerStretch
register.description: Enable stretching of individual input channels by adding 10 to 20 ns to the signal length

register.name: TriggerInvert
register.description: Inverts individual inputs for trigger generation.

register.name: TriggerCoincidence1
register.description: Enable input to be used in coincidence logic. First group of signals or'ed. At least one of the inputs to each group must fire within 40 ns to get a coincidence.

register.name: TriggerCoincidence2
register.description: Enable input to be used in coincidence logic. Second group of signals or'ed. At least one of the inputs to each group must fire within 40 ns to get a coincidence.

field.name: TriggerInputs
field.description: Number of inputs to the trigger logic

field.name: TriggerOutputs
field.description: Number of outputs of the trigger logic
